title: Reinforcement Learning Modeling for Edge State Design of Phononic Crystal Beams

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners are university students with beginner-level math knowledge aspiring to professional careers, utilizing personal devices for flexible scheduling. Edge-state design abilities are assessed through project-based evaluations.

learning_goals: Explain structural parameters and bandgap formation principles of periodic stepped phononic crystal beams
Design phononic crystal structures with target bandgaps using reinforcement learning models
Predict edge state frequency bands through modal analysis and verify via transmission/reflection experiments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
